typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	P_BATCH_NBR as string
}
source(output(
		{Project ID} as string,
		ContextCode as string,
		EventCode as string,
		A04 as string,
		Date as string,
		Country as string,
		A12 as string,
		SalesUSD as string,
		FILE_NAME as string,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SRCSALES
source(output(
		CONTEXT_SUB_TYPE_SR_KEY as integer,
		CONTEXT_TYPE_CODE as string,
		CONTEXT_TYPE_DESC as string,
		CONTEXT_SUB_TYPE_CODE as string,
		CONTEXT_SUB_TYPE_DESC as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DIMCONTEXTSUBTYPE
source(output(
		COUNTRY_SR_KEY as integer,
		COUNTRY_CODE as string,
		COUNTRY_NAME_EN as string,
		COUNTRY_NAME_ES as string,
		COUNTRY_NAME_FR as string,
		ISO2_CODE as string,
		ISO3_CODE as string,
		LEAST_DEVELPED_COUNTRY as string,
		LAND_LCKD_DEVELOPING_COUNTRY as string,
		SMALL_ISLAND_DEVELOPING_STATES as string,
		DEVELOPED_DEVELOPING_COUNTRY as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DIMCOUNTRY
source(output(
		ENTITY_SR_KEY as integer,
		ENTITY_ID as integer,
		VERSION_NO as integer,
		ENTITY_NAME as string,
		ENTITY_EMAIL_DOMAIN_NAME as string,
		ADDRESS as string,
		CITY as string,
		REGION as string,
		PHONE_NUMBER as string,
		WEBSITE as string,
		TWITTER as string,
		LINKEDIN as string,
		BSO_OWNERSHIP as string,
		POST_CODE as string,
		POBOX as string,
		CITY_REGION as string,
		CATEGORY as string,
		CONFIDENTIAL as string,
		SOCIAL_MEDIA as string,
		OTHER_EMAILS as string,
		OTHER_PHONE_NUMBERS as string,
		OTHER_INFORMATION as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET1 as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET2 as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_CITY as string,
		MAILING_STATE_PROVICE as string,
		MAILING_POST_CODE as string,
		MAILING_COUNTRY as string,
		MAILING_FORMAT_UN as string,
		FIRM_ID as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DIMENTITY
source(output(
		EVENT_TYPE_SR_KEY as integer,
		EVENT_TYPE_CODE as string,
		EVENT_TYPE_DESC as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DIMEVENTTYPE
source(output(
		PROJECT_SR_KEY as integer,
		PROJECT_ID as string,
		PROJECT_TITLE as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DIMPROJECT
source(output(
		DATE_SR_KEY as integer,
		DATE_TIME as date,
		DAY_OF_MONTH as integer,
		CALENDER_MONTH_NAME as string,
		CALENDER_MONTH_ID as integer,
		CALENDER_YEAR as integer,
		CALENDER_QUARTER_ID as integer,
		CALENDER_QUARTER_NAME as string,
		CALENDER_HALF_YEAR_ID as integer,
		CALENDER_HALF_YEAR_NAME as string,
		FISCAL_MONTH_ID as integer,
		FISCAL_MONTH_NAME as string,
		FISCAL_QUARTER_ID as integer,
		FISCAL_QUARTER_NAME as string,
		FISCAL_HALF_YEAR_ID as integer,
		FISCAL_HALF_YEAR_NAME as string,
		FISCAL_YEAR as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DIMDATE
DIMCONTEXTSUBTYPE select(mapColumn(
		CONTEXT_SUB_TYPE_SR_KEY,
		CONTEXT_TYPE_CODE,
		CONTEXT_TYPE_DESC
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectContextCode
Renaming, SelectContextCode lookup(trim(ContextCode) == trim(CONTEXT_TYPE_CODE),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupContext
DIMCOUNTRY select(mapColumn(
		COUNTRY_SR_KEY,
		COUNTRY_CODE,
		COUNTRY_NAME_EN
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCountry
LookupContext, SelectCountry lookup(upper(trim(Country)) == upper(trim(COUNTRY_NAME_EN)),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupCountry
DIMENTITY select(mapColumn(
		ENTITY_SR_KEY,
		ENTITY_ID,
		ENTITY_NAME
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectEntity
LookupCountry, SelectEntity lookup(upper(trim(A04)) == upper(trim(ENTITY_NAME)),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupEntityName
DIMEVENTTYPE select(mapColumn(
		EVENT_TYPE_SR_KEY,
		EVENT_TYPE_CODE,
		EVENT_TYPE_DESC
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectEventCode
LookupEntityName, SelectEventCode lookup(trim(EventCode) == trim(EVENT_TYPE_CODE),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupEventCode
DIMPROJECT select(mapColumn(
		PROJECT_SR_KEY,
		PROJECT_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectProjectID
LookupEventCode, SelectProjectID lookup(upper(trim({Project ID})) == upper(trim(PROJECT_ID)),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupProjectID
DIMDATE select(mapColumn(
		TRANSACTION_DATE_SR_KEY = DATE_SR_KEY,
		DATE_TIME
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectTransactionDate
LookupProjectID, SelectTransactionDate lookup(toTimestamp(Date,'MM/dd/yyyy') == DATE_TIME,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupTransactionDate
SRCSALES select(mapColumn(
		{Project ID},
		ContextCode,
		EventCode,
		A04,
		Date,
		Country,
		A12,
		SALES_IN_USD = SalesUSD,
		FILE_NAME,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Renaming
LookupTransactionDate derive(BATCH_ID = toInteger($P_BATCH_NBR),
		SOURCE = FILE_NAME,
		CREATED_BY = FILE_NAME,
		UPDATED_BY = FILE_NAME,
		DATE_CREATED = currentDate(),
		DATE_UPDATED = currentDate()) ~> RunInfo
RunInfo sink(mapColumn(
		PROJECT_SR_KEY,
		CONTEXT_SUB_TYPE_SR_KEY,
		EVENT_TYPE_SR_KEY,
		ENTITY_SR_KEY,
		TRANSACTION_DATE_SR_KEY,
		COUNTRY_SR_KEY,
		SALES_IN_USD,
		BATCH_ID,
		SOURCE,
		CREATED_BY,
		UPDATED_BY,
		DATE_CREATED,
		DATE_UPDATED
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> FACTENTITYBUSINESSTRANSACTIONS
